verses.name: Luke 14:1
verses.text: And it came to pass, as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day, that they watched him.

verses.name: Luke 14:2
verses.text: And, behold, there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy.

verses.name: Luke 14:3
verses.text: And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees, saying, Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day?

verses.name: Luke 14:4
verses.text: And they held their peace. And he took him, and healed him, and let him go;
